components: SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,PARKING BRAKE,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,POWER TRAIN,ELECTRICAL SYSTEM,EXTERIOR LIGHTING,STRUCTURE,EQUIPMENT
summary: WHEN THE BRAKES ARE APPLIED THERE IS A BURNING SMELL, AND THE  BRAKE PEDAL SOMETIMES FEELS SPONGY.  *AK   BRAKE WORK WAS DONE WITHOUT THE CONSUMER'S KNOWLEDGE.  EVER SINCE THEN, THERE HAS BEEN PROBLEMS WITH THE BRAKES.   *PH   THE ROTORS WERE CRACKED, THE PLUMBING FLEX HOSE WAS BROKEN, THE BACK CLEARANCE LIGHT WAS OUT, THE FURNITURE WINDOW TREATMENT VALANCE COMPLETELY FELL OFF, THE WERE STRESS CRACKS IN THE FIBERGLASS, THE BRAKES LOCKED UP, ELECTRICAL FAILURES, REPEATED LEVELER FAILURES, REPEATED AQUA HOT SYSTEM FAILURES, ENGINE OVERHEATING, MAIN SLIDE FAILURE WHILE TRAVELING, BASEMENT DOORS OPEN DURING TRANSIT, TRANSMISSION FAILURE, AND THE SERVICE PARKNG BRAKE FAILED(THREE TIMES).  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED A RETURN OF THE PURCHSE PRICE OR AN EXCHANGE OF THE NONCONFORMING COACH FOR A CONFORMING COACH.   *SC

MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THEY WERE NOT SENDING OUT ANY NOTIFICATION OF  BRAKE ASSEMBLY RECALL 02V27800 TO CONSUMERS BECAUSE THEY WERE NOT HONORING THE RECALL SINCE THEY DID NOT  THINK IT WAS VALID.*AK
2001 BEAVER PATRIOT THUNDER COACH HAD BEEN UNDERGOING REPAIRS FOR TRANSMISSION AND LEVELERS.  *PH  THERE WERE ALSO PROBLEMS WITH THE BOSCH BRAKES.   *TT  *JB
